1.title: Black Widower
1.plot: In the wake of Tara's death, Jax is freed from prison and makes revenge his top priority. Wendy leaves rehab early and discovers Juice is hiding from SAMCRO and laying low at her apartment.

2.title: Toil and Till
2.plot: Jax calls in the Nevada charter for help in dealing a huge blow to Henry Lin and his crew. Unser digs into Tara's murder.

3.title: Playing with Monsters
3.plot: Jax bring forth some alliances to further destroy Henry Lin and plot August Marks demise. Juice tries to reach out to Chibs, but learns his actions are beyond redemption.

4.title: Poor Little Lambs
4.plot: A past effort to help one ally leads to trouble with another.

5.title: Some Strange Eruption
5.plot: Jax looks to draw out the snitch that sold him out to Lin, leading to a confrontation at the port. Juice leaves town with Gemma and discovers her true intentions.

6.title: Smoke 'em If You Got 'em
6.plot: Jax takes advantage of shifting alliances to protect the MC and settle a score.

7.title: Greensleeves
7.plot: Samcro makes an unlikely partnership in order to undermine a powerful club enemy.

8.title: The Separation of Crows
8.plot: A traitor is suspected as SAMCRO searches for a missing member.

9.title: What a Piece of Work Is Man
9.plot: The club makes critical decisions to get a club member back. The club deals with heartache internally and conflict with the organization at large.

10.title: Faith and Despondency
10.plot: The Sons MC deal with heartache internally and conflict within the organization at large.

11.title: Suits of Woe
11.plot: As the whole of the Sons of Anarchy organization bears down on the outlaw motorcycle club's California-based Redwood Original chapter, President Jackson "Jax" Teller comes face to face with an extremely unpleasant reality.

12.title: Red Rose
12.plot: Gemma visits her father. Jax learns where she's at and goes after her. Unser gets in his way and suffers the consequences. Juice runs his last deal for the club. Wendy and Jackson get together.

13.title: Papa's Goods
13.plot: SAMCRO president Jax Teller takes the final steps towards fulfilling his father's legacy.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: A rival gang steals the Sons' stockpile of assault rifles, while Jax's ex-wife's drug overdose leads to an emergency c-section and life-threatening surgery for their baby.

2.title: Seeds
2.plot: The gang hope to be financially in the clear after their successful arms sale. But the ATF will be all over if they get linked to the warehouse arson where two Mexican immigrants were found. So the Sons exert pressure and call favors with authorities and auxiliaries, any way they can, including Jax's sexual excellence, to spy on and sabotage the investigation.

3.title: Fun Town
3.plot: When the young daughter of a prominent Charming family is assaulted during a visiting carnival, Samcro races the authorities to capture the assailant. Meanwhile a new shipment of guns arrives from their IRA connection with an additional price. Tara's ex-boyfriend arrives in Charming.

4.title: Patch Over
4.plot: The club travels to Nevada to store arms with a brother club The Devil's Tribe. When the Mayans pose a threat, Clay decides to patch-over the tribe, making them an official SOA charter. Tara's ex, ATF agent Kohn begins investigating Samcro.

5.title: Giving Back
5.plot: Gemma hosts a town fundraiser, which brings the ex club member who was responsible for Opie's arrest back to town and into direct conflict with Jax and Opie. Clay deals with protecting a perverse parolee who can lead to a big payoff. ATF agent Kohn continues to investigate SOA.

6.title: AK-51
6.plot: A small favor for Pineys old war buddy turns into a big problem for SAMCRO. With Clay detained, Jax must step-up to handle the situation. Meanwhile, Gemma deals with the pangs of aging and the arrival of a familiar sweetbutt whose intentions are unclear.

7.title: Old Bones
7.plot: When old bones are discovered on the outskirts of Charming, Clay is forced to deal with secrets he buried long ago. Meanwhile, the club sets its sights on prize money, backing Half-Sack in a bare-knuckle brawl. ATF agent Kohn's investigation turns personal when his true intentions are revealed.

8.title: The Pull
8.plot: Samcro scrambles to raise cash as the IRA gun payment comes due. The Mayans and Nords take an extreme step to cement their alliance. And Jax finds himself in danger as his relationship with Tara deepens.

9.title: Hell Followed
9.plot: SOA plans revenge on a rival biker club while hosting the wounded Cameron Hayes in the clubhouse. Meanwhile, Jax, Bobby, and Opie strive to clear the gun debt forever.

10.title: Better Half
10.plot: As ATF agent Stahl pressures the women of SAMCRO, Jax looks to Chief Unser as the key to the club's freedom. Tara can't escape nightmares about Kohn. And Cherry reveals secrets about her past to Gemma.

11.title: Capybara
11.plot: One SOA member is arrested for murder. Another goes missing. Jax has to choose between the club and one of his closest friendships. At the hospital, Abel grows stronger, but he's not the only one coming home.

12.title: The Sleep of Babies
12.plot: The club needs cash to fund Bobby's defense, but Clay's strategy leaves them in a vulnerable position. Abel comes home for the first time. But the homecoming party ends in tragedy.

13.title: The Revelator
13.plot: After a tragedy hits the club, the bonds of brotherhood are called into question and Jax must take a stand.

1.title: Albification
1.plot: With the club divided in the wake of a tragic death, Clay sets up a new gun deal with the IRA.

2.title: Small Tears
2.plot: Jax's decision without the club's approval doesn't sit well with Clay, especially when it brings dangerous repercussions upon the MC.

3.title: Fix
3.plot: The League takes bold new steps in their quest to undermine Samcro, forcing the club to take explosive measures.

4.title: Eureka
4.plot: When the MC heads north on a "charity" club run, they find more than just bike trouble when they cross state lines. And with Samcro out of Charming, Gemma's left in a compromising position with The League.

5.title: Smite
5.plot: Charming and its small-town appeal become vulnerable to The League, which finds new ways to provoke SOA members. Tara's compassionate efforts to help a distraught Gemma don't go unpunished.

6.title: Falx Cerebri
6.plot: Clay sets a course for retaliation; Gemma shows Tara how an old lady handles anger.

7.title: Gilead
7.plot: The club must make new alliances in prison to survive.

8.title: Potlatch
8.plot: With Oswald putting up the bail money, SAMCRO are released from prison, but the split between Clay and Jax is wider than ever. Complicating matters, Caruso's thugs attack Luann's studio. In an effort to heal the tensions between her husband and son, Gemma decides to organise a meal, whilst Bobby pushes to try to find out what is at the core of the dispute. Clay comes to an agreement with Oswald when he learns Jacob is planning to run for mayor. Chibs' estranged wife, Fiona Larkin, shows up at his hospital bedside, much to Gemma's chagrin. Lin has a proposal for SAMCRO...

9.title: Fa Guan
9.plot: When SAMCRO's adult film business becomes a hindrance to the club, Clay seizes the opportunity to revive the gun-running cartel. As Jax and Clay continue to clash over club activities, their relationship reaches a new level of antagonism.

10.title: Balm
10.plot: While the repo business proves more fruitful than the club ever imagined, ATF Agent Stahl gets up close and personal with the MC. Meanwhile, tension between Jax and Clay forces Gemma to make a tough decision.

11.title: Service
11.plot: Chibs makes a secret deal with Agent Stahl in order to protect his wife and daughter. Opie learns the true circumstances that led to Donna's death and seeks both revenge and reconciliation.

12.title: The Culling
12.plot: The entire SAMCRO family goes on lockdown inside the clubhouse as war with the League approaches. Opie decides not to pursue revenge against Clay or Tig for Donna's death. Jimmy puts an end to Cameron's deal with Zobelle, agreeing instead to sell exclusively to the Sons. As Chibs backs out of the deal with Stahl and attempts to convince Fiona to let him protect her, Clay tells Jimmy that Edmond has turned on the IRA. After Jax witnesses Zobelle meeting Alvarez, the Sons inform Weston of the real nature of Zobelle's business dealings in Charming. Tara applies the ...

13.title: Na Triobloidi
13.plot: As SAMCRO attempts to rid Charming of Ethan Zobelle and The League permanently, familiar faces present new challenges.

1.title: So
1.plot: The aftermath of Abel's kidnapping has the Sons reeling - especially Jax, whose grief sends him into deeper turmoil over his future with the MC. Meanwhile Gemma, still on the lam, is hit with some unexpected news from her past.

2.title: Oiled
2.plot: To get intel on Abel's whereabouts, Jax and the club help a bounty hunter track down a skip. Meanwhile, Gemma deals with family issues.

3.title: Caregiver
3.plot: The club exploits its porn connections to entertain Henry Lin's clients, which doesn't sit well with one member.

4.title: Home
4.plot: Samcro heads north to help Happy with a pharmaceutical favor in redneck territory. Gemma tries to put old family matters to rest.

5.title: Turning and Turning
5.plot: To help his mom, his club, and his son, Jax conspires with an unlikely source; meanwhile, the MC puts Chucky undercover.

6.title: The Push
6.plot: To protect their territory, Sons of Anarchy must handle a rat at St. Thomas.

7.title: Widening Gyre
7.plot: The Grim Bastards have a problem that could jeopardize Samcro's new business arrangements.

8.title: Lochan Mor
8.plot: When Samcro pays a visit to another charter, not everyone's happy to see the mother chapter.

9.title: Turas
9.plot: SAMCRO tries to get answers from Jimmy, but finds themselves in an explosive situation; and Hale looks into the attack at the gym while Tig and the others search for answers on their own.

10.title: Fírinne
10.plot: The IRA wants proof that one of their own has flipped and Samcro intends to give it to them.

11.title: Bainne
11.plot: While the club's on a man hunt, Jax faces the toughest decision of his life.

12.title: June Wedding
12.plot: With a member of the Samcro family held hostage, Jax must choose between revenge or the good of Charming.

13.title: NS
13.plot: Both the ATF and the Russians prove to be obstacles as the club looks to heal old wounds and settle old scores.

1.title: Out
1.plot: Fresh out of jail, Sam Crow reunites with family, confronts new Charming law enforcement, and shifts business alliances.

2.title: Booster
2.plot: The Sons of Anarchy are forced to make a decision that could challenge the future of the club.

3.title: Dorylus
3.plot: SAMCRO encounters an unlikely foe when a piece of their business goes missing.

4.title: Una Venta
4.plot: SAMCRO makes a run to set up a new business venture while Gemma makes a new ally in Charming.

5.title: Brick
5.plot: SAMCRO enlists a former foe to help stop the advancement of Charming Heights, while the Sheriff presses Juice for more information.

6.title: With an X
6.plot: SAMCRO's relationship with the Cartel is in jeopardy when an important package is compromised.

7.title: Fruit for the Crows
7.plot: SAMCRO deals with the fallout from a death threat made against Tara.

8.title: Family Recipe
8.plot: An important club vote gets side tracked when SAMCRO is forced to deal with dangerous external threats against the club.

9.title: Kiss
9.plot: SAMCRO gets word that the Niners have made a new alliance that directly impacts their own agenda.

10.title: Hands
10.plot: Jax and Tara get a glimpse of life without SAMCRO but discover that their reality is hard to escape.

11.title: Call of Duty
11.plot: SAMCRO is at risk of being pushed out of their own business when a powerful adversary arrives and poses a threat to their business relations with the Cartel.

12.title: Burnt and Purged Away
12.plot: SAMCRO negotiates with the Irish Kings to secure the future of the club.

13.title: To Be, Act 1
13.plot: Jax is confronted with a new challenge that threatens his family and his club.

14.title: To Be, Act 2
14.plot: Jax must overcome great obstacles as he attempts to finalize the gun deal between the Irish and the cartel.

1.title: Sovereign
1.plot: Jax presides over SAMCRO as a series of events begin to unravel Charming.

2.title: Authority Vested
2.plot: Jax and SAMCRO are challenged as past sins resurface.

3.title: Laying Pipe
3.plot: A desperate situation tests familial and club bonds.

4.title: Stolen Huffy
4.plot: Complications arise as the Sons band together to face a new adversary.

5.title: Orca Shrugged
5.plot: Jax attempts to pull Samcro into a new business venture.

6.title: Small World
6.plot: Jax brings a new proposal to the club with serious consequences.

7.title: Toad's Wild Ride
7.plot: Jax takes matters into his own hands as things go sideways.

8.title: Ablation
8.plot: Alliances are tested, while bonds are broken.

9.title: Andare Pescare
9.plot: Jax gets closer to the truth but there are still obstacles in his way.

10.title: Crucifixed
10.plot: Anticipating backlash, Jax goes into high gear with his own agenda.

11.title: To Thine Own Self
11.plot: Jax scrambles to put his affairs in order, while Nero handles business with his old crew.

12.title: Darthy
12.plot: Jax makes arrangements to take the club in a different direction.

13.title: J'ai Obtenu Cette
13.plot: Jax strikes a new deal while ridding himself of old problems.

1.title: Straw
1.plot: As Jax continues to push the club into more legitimate businesses he can't escape the sins of SAMCRO's past.

2.title: One One Six
2.plot: Jax deals with collateral damage as external pressure continue to stack up against SAMCRO.

3.title: Poenitentia
3.plot: Jax secures a new alliance for the club while Clay makes moves inside for protection.

4.title: Wolfsangel
4.plot: An attack at the compound leads SOA to seek revenge.

5.title: The Mad King
5.plot: The club is forced to make an uneasy alliance with unforeseen consequences.

6.title: Salvage
6.plot: Jax and the MC must confront their past and choose their future.

7.title: Sweet and Vaded
7.plot: Triggers are pulled that strengthen the MC, but also threaten to destroy it.

8.title: Los Fantasmas
8.plot: Pressure mounts on Jax as the sins of his club and family pull him in different directions.

9.title: John 8:32
9.plot: Jax learns new secrets that turn his world sideways.

10.title: Huang Wu
10.plot: Jax looks to push the club forward but the Irish put another obstacle in his way.

11.title: Aon Rud Persanta
11.plot: Tension mounts as the club makes a bold move to finally get out of guns.

12.title: You Are My Sunshine
12.plot: As the dust begins to settle, Jax's world is suddenly turned upside down.

13.title: A Mother's Work
13.plot: Jax has to handle some unhappy customers as the weapon deal goes through Mike's organization. Meanwhile, Tara finds a way to avoid jail without giving up the MC.

locations: Sun Valley, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Sons of Anarchy, aka SAMCRO, is a motorcycle club that operates both illegal and legal businesses in the small town of Charming. They combine gun-running and a garage, plus involvement in porn film. Clay, the president, likes it old school and violent; while Jax, his stepson and the club's VP, has thoughts about changing the way things are, based on his dead father's journal. Their conflict has effects on both the club and their personal relationships.
imdb.title: Sons of Anarchy
plot: A man in his early 30s struggles to find a balance in his life between being a new dad and his involvement in a motorcycle club.::Anonymous

_Sons of Anarchy_ (qv), aka SAMCRO, is a motorcycle club that operates both illegal and legal businesses in the small town of Charming. They combine gun-running and a garage, plus involvement in porn film. Clay, the president, likes it old school and violent; while Jax, his stepson and the club's VP, has thoughts about changing the way things are, based on his dead father's journal. Their conflict has effects on both the club and their personal relationships.::Pia

When Jackson "Jax" Teller discovers that his father had a different view in mind for SAMCRO (_Sons of Anarchy_ (qv) Motorcycle Club Redwood Original) he goes on a personal quest to clense the name and make the club a better place, but at what cost?::Dylan Immonen

camera: Panavision Genesis HD Camera, Panavision Primo, Lightweight and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
Sony CineAlta PMW-F3, Angenieux Optimo Lenses
